Uses of Class
cc.acquized.itembuilder.api.ItemBuilder

  • Packages that use ItemBuilder 
    Package Description
    cc.acquized.itembuilder.api  

    • Uses of ItemBuilder in cc.acquized.itembuilder.api

      Methods in cc.acquized.itembuilder.api that return ItemBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.amount(int amount)
      Sets the amount of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.Unsafe.builder()
      Accesses back the Main Class and exits the Unsafe Class
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.damage(short damage)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Main#durability
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.data(org.bukkit.material.MaterialData data)
      Sets the MaterialData of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.displayname(String displayname)
      Sets the Displayname of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.durability(short damage)
      Sets the durability (damage) of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.enchant(org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment enchant, int level)
      Adds the Enchantment of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.enchant(Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,Integer> enchantments)
      Sets the Enchantments of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.flag(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemFlag flag)
      Adds the ItemFlag to the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.flag(List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemFlag> flags)
      Sets the ItemFlags of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.glow()
      Makes the Item Glow
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.lore(List<String> lore)
      Sets the lore of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.lore(String line)
      Adds the line to the Lore of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.lore(String line, int count)
      Adds the line as the counts position as lore
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.lores(String... lines)
      Adds the lines to the Lore of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.material(org.bukkit.Material material)
      Sets the Material of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.meta(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.ItemMeta meta)
      Sets the ItemMeta of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.owner(String user)
      Sets the Owner of the Skull This only affects if the Item is a SKULL_ITEM or a SKULL
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.replaceAndSymbol()
      Toggles the replace of the ampersand (&) symbol to the section sign (§) symbol
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.replaceAndSymbol(boolean replace)
      Enables / disables the replace of the ampersand (&) symbol to the section sign (§) symbol
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.unbreakable(boolean unbreakable)
      Makes the Item (un-)breakable
      Constructors in cc.acquized.itembuilder.api with parameters of type ItemBuilder 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemBuilder.Unsafe(ItemBuilder builder)
      Initials the Unsafe Class with the Main
      ItemBuilder(ItemBuilder builder)
      Initials the Main with an already existing instance of the Main
